title: What if you never...
body: ...accept the contract offered by {{champion:429}} ? Would I get reported?

replies.body: This definitely needs to be fixed. Need the choice to Accept/Decline.
Yeah, I found this out in game. I was like. That is so stupid!

im 99% sure u cant decline it, meaning that someone can troll u hard. 
me and a friend tried in a custom match and i just ran away and flashed to make distance but i just stopped moving and died and that was that.
pree broken imo
